title: Teacher Training Program in Educational Robotics Linked to Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to acquire robotics pedagogy linked to mathematics courses in LMS-based asynchronous learning environments. Designed for beginners and conducted in environments with provided digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental robotics theory in connection with mathematical modeling
Learners can develop robotics lesson design plans by applying Learning-by-Design (LBD) instructional methods
Students can complete open-ended robotics projects by utilizing collaboration and problem-solving strategies.
Students can understand the fundamental principles of educational robot control systems and implement simple algorithms.
Students can critically analyze the limitations and improvement strategies of robotics education in online environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
